title: 01. Overview
text:
Understand what is computer vision/deep learning algorithms
Understand how to implement image/video processing algorithms in Python using OpenCV.
Understand how to implement/train/test convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and Transformer in PyTorch.




- What is computer vision

Image Processing, Optics, Machine Learning, Graphics, Algorihm, System Architecture, Robotics, Speech NLP

- What is deep learning

AlphaGo is using a deep learning when training their parameters
ImageNet challenge (2012년 AlexNet(8 layers) \(\rightarrow\) 2015년 ResNet(152 layers)) getting deeper
